name: Zodiac fantasy
description:
Game Background:
The little sisters have an important date (maybe several!) Now they need your help to cross the obstacles, use jumping or climbing flexibly to reach the date, the girls will thank you for it!


Game description:
Players control the character by jumping or climbing to achieve a variety of obstacles to cross the terrain or avoid and cross the trap, to reach the final target point to win.
Game features:
  • Cute and funny girls
  • Challenging levels (intentionally difficult for you)
  • 10 beautiful CGs
  • Multiple interactive gameplay
  • One click to skip (don't use)

Thank you for your support of Lovely Games Studio.
